QuestData.Title: Titanic Showdown
QuestData.Description: The tale of Huln did not end with him acquiring the Hammer of Khaz'goroth.$b$bNo. For that part, we must venture deeper into this cavern. A final brazier awaits us ahead.$b$bCome, let us see what happened next.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find and aid the spirit of Huln Highmountain.
QuestData.RewardText: And so Huln cast out Deathwing into the land of Deepholm and claimed the Hammer of Khaz'goroth as his charge.$b$bBut there was one last bit of business for him to attend to...
